snippet: A speech by Senator Barack Obama that created a stir and faded is now bringing up questions that have long been favorite topics in conservative circles.
abstract: Video of a 2007 speech by Senator Barack Obama in which he waded into the minefield of racial politics resurfaces on Web site of a conservative activist, once again providing fodder for some favorite anti-Obama discussions in conservative circles.

byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and JIM RUTENBERG

lead_paragraph: A speech by Senator Barack Obama that created a stir and faded is now bringing up questions that have long been favorite topics in conservative circles.

headline.main: Resurfaced ’07 Talk by Obama Renews Questions on Race
headline.print_headline: Race at Issue for Obama As Right Revives ’07 Talk
